Verses: 1 buththimadhigalai Virumbugiravan Arivai Virumbugiraan; Kadindhukolludhalai Verukkiravano Mirugagunamullavan.
2 nallavan Karththaridaththil Dhayaiperuvaan; Dhurchsindhanaigalulla Manushanai Avar Aakkinaikkutpaduththuvaar.
3 dhunmaarkkaththinaal Manushan Nilaivarappadaan; Needhimaangaludaiya Vero Asaiyaadhu.
4 gunasaaliyaana Sthree Than Purushanukku Kreedamaayirukkiraal; Lachchai Undupannugiravalo Avanukku Elumburukkiyaayirukkiraal.
5 needhimaangaludaiya Ninaivugal Niyaayamaanavaigal; Dhunmaarkkarudaiya Aalosanaigalo Soodhaanavaigal.
6 dhunmaarkkarin Vaarththaigal Raththansindhap Padhiviruppadhaip Patriyadhu; Uththamargaludaiya Vaayo Avargalaith Thappuvikkum.
7 dhunmaarkkar Kavizhkkappattu Ozhindhupovaargal; Needhimaangaludaiya Veedo Nilainirkum.
8 than Buththikkuthakkadhaaga Manushan Pugazhappaduvaan; Maarupaadaana Irudhayamullavano Igazhappaduvaan.
9 aagaaramillaadhavanaayirundhum, Thannaiththaan Ganampannikkollugiravanaippaarkkilum, Ganamatravanaayirundhum Panividaikkaaranullavan Uththaman.
10 needhimaan Than Mirugajeevanaik Kaappaatrugiraan; Dhunmaarkkarudaiya Irakkamum Kodumaiye.
11 than Nilaththaip Payiridugiravan Aagaaraththinaal Thrupthiyadaivaan; Veenaraip Pinpatrugiravano Madhiyatravan.
12 dhunmaarkkan Dhushtarudaiya Valaiyai Virumbugiraan; Needhimaanudaiya Ver Kani Kodukkum.
13 dhunmaarkkanukku Avan Udhadugalin Dhrogame Kanni; Needhimaano Nerukkaththinindru Neenguvaan.
14 avanavan Than Than Vaayin Balanaal Thrupthiyadaivaan; Avanavan Kaikkiriyaiyin Balanukkuththakkadhaaga Avanavanukkuk Kidaikkum.
15 madhiyeenanudaiya Vazhi Avan Paarvaikku Semmaiyaayirukkum; Aalosanaikku Sevikodukkiravano Gnaanamullavan.
16 moodanudaiya Kobam Seekkiraththil Velippadum; Lachchaiyai Moodugiravano Vivegi.
17 saththiyavaasagan Needhiyai Velippaduththuvaan; Poisaatchikkaarano Vanjagaththai Velippaduththuvaan.
18 pattayakkuththugalpol Pesugiravargalum Undu; Gnaanamullavargaludaiya Naavo Oushadham.
19 saththiya Udhadu Endrum Nilaiththirukkum; Poi Naavo Oru Nimishamaaththiram Irukkum.
20 theengaip Pinaikkiravargalin Irudhayaththil Irukkiradhu Kabadam; Samaadhaanampannugira Aalosanaikkaararukku Ulladhu Sandhosham.
21 needhimaanukku Oru Kedum Varaadhu; Dhunmaarkkaro Theemaiyinaal Niraiyappaduvaargal.
22 poi Udhadugal Karththarukku Aruvaruppaanavaigal; Unmaiyaai Nadakkiravargalo Avarukkup Piriyam.
23 vivegamulla Manushan Arivai Adakkivaikkiraan; Moodarudaiya Irudhayamo Madhiyeenaththaip Prasiththappaduththum.
24 jaakkiradhaiyullavargaludaiya Kai Aalugaiseyyum; Somberiyo Pagudhikattuvaan.
25 manushanudaiya Irudhayaththilulla Kavalai Adhai Odukkum; Nalvaarththaiyo Adhai Magizhchchiyaakkum.
26 needhimaan Than Ayalaanaippaarkkilum Menmaiyullavan; Dhunmaarkkarudaiya Vazhiyo Avargalai Mosappaduththum.
27 somberi Thaan Vettaiyaadip Pidiththadhai Samaippadhillai; Jaakkiradhaiyullavanudaiya Porulo Arumaiyaanadhu.
28 needhiyin Paadhaiyil Jeevan Undu; Andhap Paadhaiyil Maranam Illai.
